Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The giant {@LinkCreature:10#13#naga bloodscales} and {@LinkCreature:10#14#naga wyrmlings} are wreaking havoc in pitched battles against our forces. Render them unable to fight, then report to Libine at the Coastal Overwatch.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall. Nice work, <PCNAME>.
Don't let the size fool you, <PCNAME>. They bleed just like you or me.
